metadata.title: Adele - Rolling in the Deep (Official Music Video)
metadata.creator: Adele

tracks.text: Adele sits alone in a room.
A figure stands on a snow covered floor.
Adele sits near chairs, which are covered in plastic wrap. Behind her is a giant paper square showing creases. It's haphazardly duct taped to the wall.
The upstairs landing is covered in glasses of water.
A drummer sits beneath the stairs.
The water in the glasses vibrate.
The figure in the snow picks up a stick
The figure spins the stick in a circle, kicking up the snow.
The figure kicks the snow. A frosty haze forms
The figure spins in circles, the air filling with floating snow
A pile of broken dishes
On the beat, dishes are thrown down the stairs, hit a hanging board, and crumple broken in a pile.
Sparks fly near paper figures
The drummer sits still. A plate crashes.
The glasses vibrate
Lights strobe above the drummer. The figure, barely visible in the snow, kicks a stream above its head.
A large table displays a city scape made of paper. It sits in an empty room between a mounted moose head and an empty fireplace
Sparks fly
Adele takes a breath
The figure disappears behind the cloud of snow
Sparks shoot over the city
Sparks bounce past some buildings.
Spinning snow. Breaking plates. Strobing water. Paper buildings survive for now.
Smaller paper buildings begin to burn. Fire transfers to a taller one.
Ash and embers.
She looks down. Fade to black.
